review: I like Kipling bags. You can fit a lot in. I've had a few in similar designs, and I do like this one, but I have a few issues.The inner zipped pocket is great, no complaints there, but the unzipped inner pockets are less useful. If you put something in them, like a compact mirror, which they are the right size for, they often fall into the main bag. The main body of the bag also has a one way zip, which is not as convenient as the double zips that I thought came as standard on a Kipling bag of this size.I like the outer zipped pocket, although I wish it was bigger as you can maybe fit a set of credit cards in there but nothing as big as a phone or full-sized wallet. The space behind the outer pocket is actually more convenient than I thought, and good for holding things like train and bus tickets that you need to whip out and use quickly and often without rummaging.Overall, I do like it, and I am using it, but I won't be buying another one like this. It just doesn't seem like any thought has gone into the design. But it's sturdy, lightweight, and I'll probably get a few years out of it. The colour is inoffensive too.
